items.sentence: Tom picked up a napkin and wiped Mary's chin.
Tom grabbed his coat and headed for the door.
None of Tom's classmates offered to help him.
Tom doesn't seem to be aware of the problems.
Tom came up with the solution to the problem.
We've only known each other for three months.
It's been three years since they got married.
Our band's been on the road for three months.
Tom doesn't know exactly how much it'll cost.
Tom was the bearer of both good and bad news.
